English
Based on the beloved international bestselling book, The Book Thief tells
the story of an extraordinary, spirited young girl sent to live with a foster
family in WWII Germany. Intrigued by the only book she brought with her, she
begins collecting books as she finds them. With the help of her new parents
and a secret guest under the stairs, she learns to read and creates a magical
world that inspires them all.
